content.eamr: ( ing-2 "1/2 cup extra virgin olive oil" )

content.text: 0) Submerge untreated cedar plank in water.

content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Soak"@3:7 / AC
		:duration ( dur-1-0 "12 hours"@22:30 / DUR )
		:duration ( dur-1-1 "overnight"@35:44 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat.
3) Place prepared plank on the grill, and sprinkle with coarse salt.
4) Cover grill and heat plank 2 to 3 minutes, until dry.
5) Adjust grill temperature for medium heat.
6) Rub salmon filets with olive oil.
8) Top salmon with red onion, lemon slices and black peppercorns.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Top"@3:6 / AC
		:gol ( "salmon"@7:13 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "red onion"@19:28 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "lemon slices"@30:42 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "black peppercorns"@47:64 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 9) Cook salmon, covered, 10 to 12 minutes, or until opaque and easily flaked with a fork.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Cook"@-1:-1 / AC
		:ppt ( "salmon"@-1:-1 / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-9-0 "10 to 12 minutes"@-1:-1 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-9-0 "until opaque and easily flaked with a fork"@-1:-1 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
